Key Match Events: Luka Modrić scored the winning goal in the 1-0 victory over Poland
Croatia held on for an important victory after losing their Nations League opener 2-1 to Portugal
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modrić was named Man of the Match
Croatia's strong home form continued with a clean sheet
Miscellaneous Highlights: Duje Caleta-Car forced an early save from Lukasz Skorupski
Igor Matanović had multiple chances but missed
Nicola Zalewski almost scored for Poland but his effort was saved
Robert Lewandowski rattled the crossbar for Poland
